div.h3: Reviews created for delgadod for sprint Donegal 3
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-2562: Added new widget and logic to manage the work patterns.
FAB-3190: Added widgets and logic to render a work calendar.
FAB-2711: Updated Enum domain IDs to avoid collisions because people don\'t update excels properly.
FAB-3243: Updated claims version to consume latest Calendar changes
FAB-3191: Updated logic to define a specific period for the work calendar.
